venue_info.venue_address: 上海市黄浦区雁荡路103号 INS复兴乐园

project_info:
►本券不予邮寄，请于派对期间凭购买后生成的二维码于RADi现场售票处兑换领取手环。This voucher will not be mailed. Please redeem your wristband at the RADi on-site ticket counter using the QR code generated after purchase during the party.►二维码换券时间：活动当晚（10月01日晚22:00至午夜12点前）QR code redemption time: On the night of the event (October 01st, from 10:00 PM to midnight).►每个购票二维码只可领券一次，请妥善保存，并提前出示，避免排队。Each purchased QR code can only be redeemed once. Please keep it safe and present it in advance to avoid queuing.
重要提示：
1.票品非普通商品，具有时效性及稀缺性，故不适用无理由退票政策，并以门店售票规则为准。
2.因不可抗力原因发起的退票情况，我们将开启极速退款通道，确保用户利益。
3.未成年人不得进入RADi
Important Notes:
-Once tickets for this event are sold, they are non-refundable and non-exchangeable.
-Minors are not allowed entry into RADi.
